me prathicharaya magin oba wahanse athulu siyalu maha nahimi warunta yojana karanne, me palath palana mathiwarana prathipalaya samanga wiwruthawana nawa deshapalana awakashaya uparima washayen prayojanayata gena rata idiriyata gaman kala yuthu dishawa thiranaya karanna awashya 'danuma' sampadanaya karaganna, paksha pata abhibawa yana ''deshapalana sangayanawak'' pawathwanna, ithama kadinamin.

janaral sarath fonseka mahathata erehiwa pawathwena yuda adhikaranaya balarahitha karana lesath yuda hamuda athadanguwen nidahas karana lesath illamin idiripath wi athi pethsam sambandhayen nithipathiwaraya mathu kala wirodhathawa pilibanda thinduwa prakashayata path kirima mayi 3 da dakwa abhiyachanadhikaranaya wisin eeye (31) kal thabini.ema dinaya thek fonseka mahathata erehi yuda adhikaranaye danata pawathina katayuthu elesama pawathwa gena ya yuthu yayi adhikaranaya thiranaya kaleya.abhiyachanadhikarana sabhapathi sathya hettige, ranjith silwa saha anil gunarathna yana winishchaya mandalaya eeye me thiranayata elambaini.fonseka mahatha shreshtadhikaranaya wisin illa athi sahanayakma abhiyachanadhikaranaya wethin illa athi heyin pethsama pawathwa gena ya nohaki yayi nithipathi mohan piris mahatha wirodhathawak mathu¬™ kala athara pethsam wibhagayata ganimata nothisi nikuth kirimata pera ema wirodhaya sambandhayen adhikaranaya hamuwe karunu dakwima thedinak pura sidu kerini.karunu dakwima awasan wu awasthawedi wistharathmaka lesa likhithawa karunu adhikaranayata idiripath kirimata awashya bawath ee sandaha sathi dekaka kalayak awashya bawath nithipathiwaraya pawasu athara likhithawa karunu idiripath kirimata deparshwayatama niyama kerini.janaral sarath fonseka mahathata erehiwa pawathwena yuda adhikaranaya bala rahitha karana sartiyorati rit aagnyawak panawana lesa illamin fonseka mahathada, yuda hamudawa wisin athadanguwata gena hamudawa bharaye randawa gena sitina fonseka mahatha adhikaranaya hamuwata pamunuwa nidahas karana lesa illamin habayas kopus rit aagnyawak anoma fonseka mahathmiyada abhiyachanadhikaranayata idiripath kara thibe.
